title._content: [Unidentified company of soldiers in Union uniforms in front of trees and buildings in Virginia]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified company of soldiers in Union uniforms in front of trees and buildings in Virginia] [1862] 1 photograph : half-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 12.2 x 15.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Grapes in vase with bird, scroll exterior. Additional information in collections file. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photograph shows third soldier from the right with pioneer emblem above corporal's chevrons. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: United States.--Army.--People--Virginia--1860-1870. Soldiers--Union--Virginia--1860-1870. Military uniforms--Union--Virginia--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union--Virginia. Format: Group portraits--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Photograph cases--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.30608 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 5056
